message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SE 

The paper focuses on security and safety issues related to home automation, which suggests a strong connection to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and cybersecurity (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the challenges of designing and evaluating approaches for home automation, which could fall under information retrieval (cs.IR) and software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper presents a framework for generating natural home automation scenarios, which could be related to social and information networks (cs.SI).
